name: Cats in Christmas Hats 2013
description:
This exclusive collection was created by Roxy & NeveRose!!

This Set includes One 5 x 7 Catnip Pillow &
Two Trapper Toys 

All are handmade here at Kitty Collage & filled with our 2013 Organic Catnip!

Please note that these will not ship until Dec 5th. They will be stuffed just prior to shipping to keep them fresh & potent!!

name: 2013 Organic Catnip New Jersey Harvest
description:
This Limited Edition Harvest is from our organic seeds & grown in the Garden State of New Jersey!! 

Our Organic Catnip is free of chemicals, fertilizers, & pesticides.  Grown in 100% Organic Soil.  Your cat will enjoy an exotic experience & will thank you for it over & over again!!  

These are 3 x 4 inch zip lock bag with a "gel canister" to prevent moisture during shipping!! Each package has almost a quarter ounce of 2013 Organic Catnip.  Each one is handpicked & hand packed here @ Kitty Collage!!

We have been growing Catnip for over 20 years & take great pride in how we grow, dry & package it for the Kitties to Enjoy.. We have included storing instructions to keep it fresh longer!!!  MEOW to that!!

Treat you kitty to a bag today!

Quantities are Limited...

name: MOGUL'S CATNIP RAFFLE
description:
This is a fundraiser event for the MogulFund.

Each set includes two Mogul Cards (different pics) on each with his
Cat Stats listed on the backside.

A Mini Bag of of 2013 Organic Catnip!!

A Mouse (colors vary) from FoxyRoxy

& a scroll of Mogul's Story as told by his forever Mommy!!

Each one is packaged in a cello paw print bag!!!!

$5.00 from the sale of each "Mogul Catnip Raffle" set will be donated to the MogulFund!!

name: Trapper Treats Catnip Toys Garbage Can Cats
description:
TRAPPER'S CATNIP TOYS

 A favorite of cats for over 10 years!!! These handmade toys are filled with 100% Organic Catnip grown the the garden @ Kitty Collage. 

The toys measure 3 x 4 inches & top stitched for extra durability. They are individually package right after they are stuffed to insure the freshness of our "nip". 

Our catnip is from 6th generation plants grown in organic soil without any pesticides or chemicals. This is the reason our "catnip" is so strong & potent. 

Each toy is cut by hand with one side highlighting a "cat scene" & the back matching usually with paw print fabric. Each toy is ready to be stuffed just prior to shipping!!!! 

Quality is our priority @ Kitty Collage & I personally make each one by hand. I have been sewing for 40 years & take great pride in my creations.

Treat your furry friend to one today!!

Check out our FB page for pics of some of the kitties enjoying our toys.

Many purrs to all from the cats @ Kitty Collage 

NeveRose, Grease, Lilli & Roxy (the deaf kitty)

name: Go Green w/ Chloe Tote Red/White Cat Faces
description:
Here @ Kitty Collage we are a GO GREEN COMPANY
Introducing our Tote Bag designed to replace the
plastic bag.

It measures 12 x 14 the size of the average plastic bag!!
It is doubled stitched, first with a regular sewing machine &
then serged with a serger for durability.  The handles are 
reinforced with seven (7) stitches for extreme durability.

It can be rolled up & tucked inside your regular purse so that
it will be handy when needed.  

Just think if you used it  once a week instead of yet another
plastic bag you would save 52 plastic bags from going to the landfill.

Each bag is handmade here @ Kitty Collage!!!

Please note they do not have inside pockets...but then neither
do plastic bags. Go Green w/ the  Chloe Collection!

categories.name: Go Green with Chloe Reusable Tote Bags

description:
These Guest Towels are machine embroidered & measure
21 x 14 inches.

They are 55% Linen & 45% Cotton

They have a small eyelet border around the bottom!!!

Purrfect gift for the cat lover in your life!!!

name: Stacking Cats (small)
description:
Blossom Bucket creates this incredible cute ceramic collection that we have carried in our store location & sold at Craft Shows for over 10 years.

The quality is top of the line & we are so excited to carry them in our Web Store now.

This one measures 3 &1/2 inches tall & 2 inches wide.

They make a purrfect gift for the Cat Lover in your life...
